## Source: ossf-package-analysis (724956d5e6ddbc30c35608c68d7472fa0048ac56d9b14ce49222f18a4287d39f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@devlovedz/react-native-camera-kit-example' @ 0.1.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
